title: What to know about incoming Senate Majority Leader John Thune
shortDescription: What to know about the incoming Republican Senate Majority Leader, John Thune of South Dakota.

title: No, Trump’s White House won’t be on sex offender registry | Fact check
shortDescription: Trump has never been convicted of a sex crime and isn’t required to register as a sex offender, so the White House won't appear on any such registry.

title: Tapped for Trump's new team, business is booming for Elon Musk
shortDescription: Musk fundraised for and promoted Trump while running a constellation of six companies this year.

title: No, Trump hasn't named Tucker Carlson as press secretary | Fact check
shortDescription: There was no evidence of a Tucker Carlson appointment when the social media posts were made. Trump later named Karoline Leavitt to the position.

title: 'Sickening display': Biden, White House condemn neo-Nazi march in Ohio
shortDescription: The White House and President Joe Biden denounced the group of neo-Nazis who marched in Columbus, Ohio, on Saturday, calling it a "sickening display."

title: House Ethics Committee pushed to keep Gaetz report secret | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Trump's Defense secretary pick Pete Hegseth was involved in a 2017 sexual assault probe. Plus, Jake Paul defeated Mike Tyson. It's all on The Excerpt.

title: Trump to declare emergency, use military for mass deportation
shortDescription: Trump could use the national emergency to launch mass deportations and enforce the southern border and immigration laws.

title: What does Trump's Agenda47 say about immigration? Here's what to know.
shortDescription: Donald Trump has stacked his Cabinet with advisers poised to carry out his immigration platform. His Agenda47 outlined his ideas on immigration.

title: How Biden allowing long-range missiles will impact the Ukraine war
shortDescription: President Biden will allow Ukraine to carry out long-range strikes on Russian targets, according to reports. How could it impact the war?

title: Biden first US sitting president to visit Amazon rainforest
shortDescription: President Biden became the first U.S. sitting president to visit the Amazon rainforest during a stop ahead of the G20 summit.

title: 'Stakes couldn't be higher': Climate experts brace for Trump policies
shortDescription: Trump named former New York Congressman Lee Zeldin to run the Environmental Protection Agency.

title: When is Inauguration Day 2025? Trump set to be sworn in
shortDescription: Donald Trump hit the ground running with his transition to the White House ahead of Inauguration Day 2025.

title: Biden in the background as G20 nations brace for the return of Trump
shortDescription: Donald Trump’s impending return to White House has foreign leaders jockeying for position as U.S. President Joe Biden attends his final G20 Summit.

title: Donald Trump taps Brendan Carr to lead the FCC
shortDescription: Carr had called out NBC for allowing Kamala Harris to appear on Saturday Night Live days before the election.

title: Who has Trump picked for his Cabinet so far? Here's what to know
shortDescription: Donald Trump nominated Chris Wright to head the Department of Energy and personal lawyer Will Scharf as a White House staff secretary.

title: Trump wants criminal probe of pollster who said Harris was ahead in Iowa
shortDescription: J. Ann Selzer's Nov. 1 poll showed Kamala Harris leading Donald Trump in Iowa, 47% to 44%. Trump eventually carried the state by 13 points.

title: Trump ringside with pals and cabinet picks at Madison Square Garden
shortDescription: A who's-who of Trumpworld joined the president-elect at Madison Square Garden on Saturday, including Elon Musk, RFK Jr., Dana White and Tulsi Gabbard.

title: Joe Biden lifts ban on Ukraine using US arms to strike inside Russia
shortDescription: President Joe Biden's administration has lifted restrictions that had blocked Ukraine from using U.S.-provided weapons to strike deep into Russian territory.

title: Mike Johnson says he's still against releasing Matt Gaetz ethics report
shortDescription: Johnson said on CNN Sunday he still opposes releasing an ethics report on Gaetz. But GOP Sen. Markwayne Mullin said he wants to see the findings.

title: Trump's takeover: Matt Gaetz to Elon Musk signal combat ahead
shortDescription: Donald Trump, finishing his first full week as president-elect, made it clear he plans to pursue even his most controversial campaign promises.

title: Trump win spurs hope, expectations for some. Here's what they said.
shortDescription: For the voters who supported Trump, expectations are high for prices to come down, borders to shut and incomes to rise.

title: Trump taps personal attorney Will Scharf to key White House position
shortDescription: Will Scharf, who represented Donald Trump in election interference case, is the fourth of the president-elect's attorneys to land a key White House role.

title: Trump picks oil industry CEO Chris Wright to lead Energy department
shortDescription: Trump picked industry executive Chris Wright as his nominee to be Energy secretary and to join a new Council of National Energy.

title: Zelenskyy says war will end quicker under Donald Trump
shortDescription: On the battlefields of eastern Ukraine, Russia is now advancing at the fastest rate since the war's earliest days in 2022.

title: John Fetterman to Democrats: 'You really ought to pace yourselves'
shortDescription: Democratic Sen. John Fetterman warned his fellow party members in an interview that they can’t get “freaked out” over every move Trump makes.

title: How Trump's Pentagon pick Hegseth fell out of love with the US military
shortDescription: How Hegseth became an "anti-woke" advocate is still coming into view. But it is becoming increasingly clear that he came to a crossroads in January 2021.
